Subscription.Description: Provides visibility of processes accessing other processes
Subscription.Query: <QueryList> <!-- Process access events --> <Query Id="0" Path="Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational"> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational"> *[System[(EventID=10)]] </Select> <Suppress Path="Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational"> <!-- For potential processs memory reads, only capture this if it's to LSASS or WinLogon, since this is relatively common activity. --> *[EventData[Data[@Name='GrantedAccess']='0x1410']] and (*[EventData[Data[@Name='TargetImage']='C:\Windows\system32\lsass.exe']] or *[EventData[Data[@Name='TargetImage']='C:\Windows\system32\winlogon.exe']]) </Suppress> </Query> </QueryList>
